caption.p: Application of ultrasound in combination with other techniques.

tr.td: Extraction temperature, 5 °C; extraction time, 0.5 h; Pressure, 5 MPa
Ultrasound helps to increase the14% extraction yield of adlay oil and coixenolide.
microwave power, 98 W; extracting time, 367 s; the ratio of solvent to tomato paste, 10.6:1
Shorter extraction time, Less volume of the solvents needed and higher lycopene yield. Increase the yield of lycopene from 89.4% to 97.4%. Decrease extraction time from 29.1 min to 6.1 min
Ultrasound frequency, 19 kHz; microwave power, 80 W
Extraction times were reduced up to 10-fold. Extraction yields increased by 50–500%
Decreased time of osmotic dehydration from 9 h to 40 min.
15% salt/50% sugar solution; temperature, 45 °C; time, 30 min
Increase the efficiency and speed on osmotic dehydration. Improved the quality of fried potatoes by reducing oil and moisture content.
Increased the water diffusivity by 45.1%. Decrease up to 31% on the drying time.
ultrasonic treatment for 5 min (600 and 1200 W/L) followed by HPP for 5 min (450 MPa).
The retention of organic acids was high (greater than90%), An increase in anthocyanin content up to 24%.
Ultrasound amplitude, 45%; duty cycle of ultrasonic exposure, 5 s ; temperature of water-bath, 75 °C; ultrasonic time, 10 s ;the height of the probe, 9 cm; inclination angle, 45°
oleaginous seeds such as sunflower, rape and soybean seeds
rotation speed: 10 rpm; temperature: 190 °C 200 W ultrasonic wave
Reduction in apparent viscosity of PP by 42.8%. Depress the elastic effect and the extruding swell ratio. The molecular weight of PP is reduced and its molecular weight distribution is narrower.
Extrusion speed, 40 mm/s; frequency, 20 kHz; amplitude; 10 m
The extrusion force and the material flow stress were reduced by 14%.
Ultrasound power, 50 W; temperature 25 °C; time, 30 s Enzyme (9 µL/g tomato industrial waste powder); time, 60 min; pH 4.5; temperature, 45 °C
Highest extraction of lycopene. Reduction in the sonication time.
Ultrasonic frequency, 26 kHz ; ultrasound power, 200 W
Reduced the time required to achieve yield from 80 min to 20 min. Maintain the flavor of essential oil.
